name: Music_2570.wav
caption: This is an afrobeat music piece. The melody is being played by a vibrant orchestra of brass sections with a saxophone lead, a keyboard, an electric guitar and a bass guitar. In the rhythmic background, there is an afrobeat acoustic drum beat played with numerous percussion instruments. The atmosphere is playful. The piece could be used in the soundtrack of an action-filled movie or TV series. It could also be used in the soundtrack of an action video game.
